amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a water supply feasibility study for Tualatin River Basin, Oregon.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1683 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1683 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Smith. (consideration: CR S11538; text: CR S11538) To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a water supply feasibility study for Tualatin River Basin, Oregon.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1683 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1683 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Smith.
